resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158075</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158075</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3017</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Online-Exhibitions -My Homeland</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Online-Ausstellungen - Meine Heimat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En ligne-Expositions - Ma Patrie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em linha-Online-Exhibitions - Meu Homeland</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In linea-Mostre - La Mia Patria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε απευθείας σύνδεση-εκθέσεις - η πατρίδα μου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En li'nea-Exposiciones - Mi Patria</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This multimedia presentation tells the dramtic story of the arival and life of some 250,000 Holocaust survivors who currently live in the State of Israel, now marking its 60th year of independence.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">holocaust education</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">homeland</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">survivoirs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Multimediadarstellung erklärt die dramtic 
Geschichte vom arival und vom Leben von ca. 250.000 Holocaust 
Überlebenden, die aktuell im Zustand von Israel leben und jetzt 
kennzeichnet sein 60th Jahr von Unabhängigkeit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette présentation de multimédia indique 
l'histoire dramtic de l'arival et de la vie d'environ 250.000 
Holocauste survivants qui vivent actuel dans l'état de l'Israel, 
marquant maintenant sa soixantième année de l'indépendance.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta apresentação dos multimedia diz a história 
dramtic do arival e da vida de uns 250.000 sobreviventes de Holocaust 
que vivem atualmente no estado de Israel, marcando agora seu 60th ano 
da independência.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa presentazione di multimedia dice alla storia
dramtic del arival e della vita di circa 250.000 superstiti di 
Holocaust che attualmente in tensione nel Dichiarare dell'Israele, ora
contrassegnante il relativo sessantesimo anno di indipendenza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η παρουσίαση πολυμέσων λέει τη dramtic 
ιστορία του arival και της ζωής περίπου 250.000 επιζόντων 
ολοκαυτώματος που ζουν αυτήν την περίοδο στο κράτος του Ισραήλ, 
χαρακτηρίζοντας τώρα το 60ο έτος ανεξαρτησίας του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta presentación de las multimedias cuenta la 
historia dramtic del arival y de la vida de unos 250.000 
sobrevivientes de Holocaust que vivan actualmente en el estado de 
Israel, ahora marcando su 60.o año de la independencia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">holocaust Ausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heimat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">survivoirs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">holocauste éducation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">patrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">survivoirs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">instrução do holocaust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">homeland</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">survivoirs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">formazione del holocaust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">patria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">survivoirs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Israele</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκπαίδευση ολοκαυτώματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πατρίδα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">survivoirs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ισραήλ</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
